summer.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/g-limit
summer.description: This deviates slightly from the diagram, but I think this is how its intended.

pure_gain.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/alpha-indicated-gain
pure_gain.description: This is 0.5 on diagram, but needs to be higher to be able to recover from sustained turn at low speeds. At 1.0 it will limit alpha to 25-30 degs and prevent a deep stall.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-rate-lower-switch
switch.description: Is 1.0 or 10 in diagram, but does not make sense to me.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/normal-1-special
switch.description: This prevents NaN to propagate through the system

lag_filter.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/normal-lagged
lag_filter.description: Bypassing this sim lag as its close to 120 Hz timestep.
